photos.content: I studied photography as part of my degree and have been taking photos ever since. Nowadays, I restrict myself to a fully manual fixed-focal-length lens on a rangefinder-style camera plus the ubiquitous phone camera.

music.content:
I make electronic music with dedicated hardware instruments and recording devices. I don't use computers or screens.

This page features a small selection. Find even more on YouTube.

map.content:
The map shows various cities I have lived and worked from and keeps track of places I visit.

Created with D3 - Here is to exploring!
